summary: Integration test suite that validates Conan's configuration subsystem, covering profile creation, inheritance and priority, settings loading, SSL and client certificate handling, proxy configuration, required Conan version checks, authentication remote plugin behavior, custom Conan home handling, Jinjaâ€‘based profile rendering, and related plugin error handling.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of Conan's configuration mechanisms so that users can safely manage profiles, settings, security credentials, proxy settings, and version constraints in automated package management workflows.
